title: Viper Witcher Gear Locations - The Witcher 3: Heart of Stone
text: Previous THE WITCHER 3: WILD HUNT -- HEARTS OF STONE - VIPER WITCHER GEAR LOCATIONS - THE WITCHER 3: HEART OF STONE â†’ 12 OCT 2015 IGN shows you where to find the exclusive new Viper Witcher Gear in the Hearts of Stone expansion for The Witcher 3. For more on TW3, check out our full wiki on IGN @ http://www.ign.com/wikis/the-witcher-3-wild-hunt Don't have IGN Prime? Join Today! Get access to these videos: 416 x 234
